overview: Welcome to Tropical Punch, a VIP cocktail party on the island of Tahiti with 45 of the world's best on the guest list. Enjoy Access All Areas treatment to the mind blowing sessions that transpired during the 2007 Billabong Pro. Headlining acts include Andy Irons, Kelly Slater, Taj Burrow, Mick Fanning, Bruce Irons and Joel Parkinson.  Throw some fruit in the blender and get comfortable because no matter where you are, this is where the party's at.
title: Tropical Punch
